default.value: Project cleanup: removed 725+ files, saved 15-20MB using phased dependency analysis. USDT balance fix: solved currency configuration mismatch with asset variant mapping. Both successful using conservative approach.

Balance synchronization: multi-variant asset mapping for Kraken USDT currency accounts. Project cleanup: conservative phased approach with dependency analysis. Error resolution: systematic debugging with targeted fixes.

When USDT is primary currency on Kraken, balance API returns different structures. Solution: enhanced asset normalization with variants (USDT.F, USDT.S, USDT.B, etc.) and storage under both normalized and original keys for compatibility.
